name: The Powerpuff Girls: Paint the Townsville Green
description: The Gangreen Gang is on a rampage, spreading their destruction and chaos throughout Townsville! How are you going to stop them?! Well, you could try reason, and tell them that the dark path is not the road to self-enlightenment. OR, you could help Buttercup and her sisters track down the Gangreen Gang and administer an old fashioned whoopin'!
